title: ETSI Domain: Ethics & Law
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-ethics-law-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20347
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain: Ethics & Law
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Domain marker for ETSI metaverse categorization covering ethical frameworks, legal compliance, regulatory requirements, and responsible governance structures for virtual environments.
	- source:: [[ETSI GR MEC 032]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomain_EthicsLaw
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-ethics-law-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Metaverse Domain Taxonomy]]
		- has-part:: [[Ethical Frameworks]]
		- has-part:: [[Regulatory Systems]]
		- has-part:: [[Rights Management]]
		- has-part:: [[Legal Compliance]]
		- requires:: [[Policy Enforcement]]
		- requires:: [[Compliance Monitoring]]
		- enables:: [[Legal Accountability]]
		- enables:: [[User Protection]]
		- enables:: [[Responsible AI]]
		- depends-on:: [[Digital Services Act]]
		- depends-on:: [[Content Moderation Standards]]
		- depends-on:: [[GDPR]]

ontology.definition: Domain marker for ETSI metaverse categorization covering ethical frameworks, legal compliance, regulatory requirements, and responsible governance structures for virtual environments.
